about.title: About Guttakrutt
about.joinUs: Join Us for The War Within
about.foundedText: Guttakrutt is a fully Norwegian guild that was founded late in the Shadowlands expansion. Since then, we've grown steadily and have established ourselves as an active raiding guild on
about.welcomingEnv: We offer a mature and welcoming environment with a great atmosphere. Our Discord is active and used by most guild members regularly. Many members also run Mythic+, providing plenty of opportunities to get involved beyond raiding.
about.learnAbout: Learn about our guild history, raid schedules and requirements for The War Within.
about.recruiting: We're currently recruiting exceptional Norwegian players for our progression teams:
about.allClassesConsidered: All classes considered with a focus on:

heroSection.title: Welcome to Guttakrutt
heroSection.subtitle: A Norwegian raiding guild on Tarren Mill
heroSection.motto: "United by excellence, forged in the flames of the North."

apply.title: Apply to Guttakrutt
apply.description: Interested in joining our guild? Fill out our application form and we'll get back to you.
apply.formDescription: Please fill out our application form with details about your character, experience, and availability. Our recruitment team will review your application and contact you if there's a good fit.
